content: Azure Dust is one of the more hidden Transformation Spells in Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike some of the other Transformations, Azure Dust doesn't have much flexibility in how you use it. But, it has some powerful attacks even the Transformation is hard to control.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Azure_Dust.md', within the main section titled 'Azure Dust'.
The content is as follows:
Azure Dust is one of the more hidden Transformation Spells in Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike some of the other Transformations, Azure Dust doesn't have much flexibility in how you use it. But, it has some powerful attacks even the Transformation is hard to control.
